While I have changed some settings, even when I use the default crawl profi=
le, I don't think images are being downloaded.

Crawling www.cnn.com, I get=
 to 500 pages, and 1.4MB.  That seems a little small if there are images.

=
If I open the ARC file in a text editor, all the data appears to be textual=
.

If I stick the ARC file in my Wayback folder, and browse the crawled sit=
e in Wayback, the images are all missing.
